resources.string: Due to a bug in your version of Android, this option cannot be disabled.
Due to a bug in your version of Android, this option cannot be disabled.
Please open settings for this app and enable \"Contacts\" inside the \"Permissions\" section

When enabled, this option declines all calls that were not verified using carrier verification. If your carrier and the carrier of those calling you do not implement SHAKEN/STIR verification, this could block a lot of potentially valid callers!
When enabled, this option declines callers which fail carrier verification. Callers that fail this check have a high likelihood of originating from a faked source.
Decline calls from anyone not listed in your contacts. This includes calls where caller ID is blocked or unavailable for some reason.
